biotools.summary: Software for the evaluation of single-cell experiments. While its core functionality is the visualization of time-resolved, single-cell but also population data, it can be used for the automated/scripted analysis of data as well.

bioschemas.name: Vizardous
bioschemas.summary: Software for the evaluation of single-cell experiments. While its core functionality is the visualization of time-resolved, single-cell but also population data, it can be used for the automated/scripted analysis of data as well.
